nodes.text: Yes, I'm just slaving away at the books and studying my notes. Wouldn't want to fail the final... I might get expelled!
Good thing for you that the semester is almost over - you might perish from all that hard work.

options.text: Talk About the Sea Cave Date
Make an Excuse for Missing the Date

nodes.text: Well, you see... it was like this... just as I was heading to our date the other day, Terk stopped me in the Great Hall and ordered me to scrub down the floor of the Dining Hall.
He stood there watching to make sure that I didn't miss a spot on the floor. It took me a couple of hours to finish.
When I finally got away from Terk, I ran to the Sea Caves but you had already gone away. I spent the day searching for you there.
Please, forgive me.
You idiot. I can't believe you let Terk catch you like that!
Maybe we can get together some other time.
Yeah, right. As if you didn't have Terk twisted around your little finger. You are a lying bucket of chum.
Katie, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to stand you up like that. There was so much going on with all the Dire Rats... I... I'm so sorry.
It's just lucky for you that you are so charming... I should have you keelhauled for standing me up like that. You owe me a date... a fancy one.
You scurvy son of a lobster... You stood me up for a Drat? You're lucky I don't scupper you with a marlin spike!
About that date... you see, there was this infestation of Drats running around this school, and someone had to do something about it. I just happened to be that hero.
After all, a Hero's gotta do what a Hero's gotta do.
Sometimes, Shawn, you really should win the "Jerk of the Year" contest.
You lily-livered, lying, rotten pile of Gog meat ... You stood me up for a Drat? You deserve to taste the cat!
I really enjoyed our date in the Sea Caves. We should do that again sometime soon.
There's no time left for dates this semester - it's almost over.
What about after school is out... maybe I could meet you in Caligari?
Hey... we're in love, aren't we? There's no maybe about it. I intend to spend a lot of time with you.
I'd really like that, Shawn. I'll be staying at the Lucky Lady Inn. Come up and see me sometime.
I'll do that.
You know, you're beautiful when you're angry.
Watch it, O'Conner, or we'll see how beautiful you look with my cutlass in your craw.
You know, you are the most beautiful woman I've ever met.
Flattery will get you as far as a fish in a bucket.
You know, you are going to be cleverest and cutest sea captain to ever sail the Med Sea.
So, are you volunteering to be my First Mate?
I'll sail with you anywhere.
Good night and sweet dreams.
If my dreams be sweet, I'll see you hanging from the yardarms.
Then I'll be dreaming of you tonight.
Sleep well, Shawn.
